data.eml:eml: A new species of Litarachna (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Pontarachnidae) from a Caribbean mesophotic coral ecosystem

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pesic, Vladimir, Chatterjee, Tapas, Alfaro, Monica, Schizas, Nikolaos V. (2014): A new species of Litarachna (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Pontarachnidae) from a Caribbean mesophotic coral ecosystem. ZooKeys 425: 89-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.8110, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.8110
